==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=雄黄}}

===Etymology===
From Chinese [[雄]] ("[[yang|manly]]") + [[黃]] ("yellow"), for the yellow powder formed as [[pararealgar]] and distinguished from [[雌黃]] ("[[orpiment]]", lit. "[[yin|feminine]] yellow")
